body:
Hey Everyone,
I just wanted to open up an AMA for people to ask me questions. I thought it would be good for you guys to get to know your favorite director a little better ;)   I don't care how personal the question, Ill answer it as long as it isn't like my full name, address, credit card number, or something stupid. You can be personal, or you can be vague, whatever pleases you! Ill be answering every once in a while when I jump online.
Have Fun!
-Max

Answer set 1 is on page 3

You can be personal, or you can be vague, whatever pleases you! Ill be answering every once in a while when I jump online.

replies.body:
How did you become director?
Was it hard or easy with lots of time?
How is being director different than being a normal player?
What do you (dis)like about being a director?
How does it feel to be a director?
Do you even director?
What type of relationship do you have with Ivy?

Ok, that's all the boring questions set aside xD

Which do you like more, a sphere or a cube and why?
What's your favorite color and why?
If you had to creatively use an  undangerous object as a weapon what would it be and how would you hurt your victim?
Would you rather never touch a computer again or someone of the opposite sex again?
What's your favorite type of music?
What are your theories on the Universe? :o
Would you rather want to be a wizard or an animal of your choosing?

That's all. I promise o3o

replies.body:
Let me ask you a yes/no question. It is VERY important that you don't lie, as you WILL die if you do not answer HONESTLY and do not answer yes or no.

Will your answer be a no?
What's your favorite ice cream?
If frogs eat 8 pancakes a day, what is the probability the sky will fall and hit a hobo?

replies.body: Are you going to answer these questions?
replies.body_tagged: Are you going to answer these questions?

replies.body:
@Violent and @Para: k
@Mooch and @Dooz: Gratzi <3  Love yah too
@QFrog: Gillette is my last name, so I decided to do gilletteracer because I race sailboats. It was meant to be a play on words because of gillette razors. AviGill is the beginning of my favorite server and Gill to keep my identity.
@DaBader: I love to direct, and help people with problems over Skype.
@Boss: Big Boom
@Steven: Its pretty badass
@AWarrio:r Kat Daddy is a pretty Kool Kat
@mr_penguin: OMG, how'd you know?
@Ky: Sadly Iz isn't the father.
@Smit: its going to get pretty awesome pretty soon
@Ky: kthxbai
@Golden: Ill do yours at the bottom xD
@RCMP: I would rather be trampled by 100 duck sized horses. Thats a pretty memorable death.
@Ca:l Sì
@Cinammon: Once every few years I hit the gym, besides that nope xD
@Howsie: Sadly Avicore has ben further delayed due to some unexpected delays. It will be out in exactly 23.12 years.
@Maddy: I dont comprehend the intro sentence xD. But my answer will not be a no. My fav ice cream is soy vanilla with chocolate syrup.
@Clock: I usually make myself a killer bowl of cereal.
@Volt: Probably Vendadde, he's a chill guy.
@Quessadillas: I do in fact, I can breathe underwater forever.
@Murph: Finally an important question xD   Basically directors watch over all of the server, and are ultimately in charge of making everything run smoothly. I run the community, Howsie is in charge of staff, and Ivy is in charge of EVERYTHING else. Managers are in charge of certain aspects of staff and other items of interest. They have more detailed jobs in keeping order.
@DaBader: Nope

Time for the list xD
How did you become director?
Its really a long story. I met Funky back in like Beta 1.6 or something. After a long time, I finally become Mod on his server (one of the few active ones). I then followed him to MC Zone where he promoted me to admin. Ive stuck around since then and been a help, so Ive finally worked my way up to director. Thats a very shortened version of the story.
Was it hard or easy with lots of time?
Umm, I don't know what the question, haha.
How is being director different than being a normal player?
Its a lot of responsibility and thinking. We come up with ideas for the server all of the time, and we always have to be kind and helpful to all players. Its important that we keep our calm, and always look for something to work on. Its a completely different experience in my opinion because I play for fun like 50% of the time, but I play to think of improvements the other 50%.
What do you (dis)like about being a director?
Hmm, I really wouldn't be playing Minecraft if I wasn't so involved in a community like this. So basically I like it all!
How does it feel to be a director?
In my opinion it feels great to be a director. I like being looked up to and I like being able to help out in any way possible.
Do you even director?
Sadly, I have not learned how to director. Ive been working on it for a while, but haven't exactly nailed the art.
What type of relationship do you have with Ivy?
Umm, we are amigos I guess. I don't really know, haha.
Which do you like more, a sphere or a cube and why?
Spheres, balls are much more fun to play with than like stacking cubes. But I also like cubes because of the way they stack and work together.
What's your favorite color and why?
Green. I don't really know, Ive just liked the color forever.
If you had to creatively use an  undangerous object as a weapon what would it be and how would you hurt your victim?
I would obviously use a whale or walrus. I don't really know, but it'd be pretty awesome beating someone with a whale.
Would you rather never touch a computer again or someone of the opposite sex again?
Never touch my computer again. Hahahahaha, I am very into my girlfriend, so I don't think that would ever happen.
What's your favorite type of music?
Country by far. Let the hate begin!
What are your theories on the Universe? :o
My theory of the universe goes like this: Bang, everything is made. Bang: Live begins. A few more bangs and we have Earth!
Would you rather want to be a wizard or an animal of your choosing?
I would rather be a wizard who could turn into an animal of my choosing. 



BANG! DONE

replies.body:
@YouFace: I assume 1 is the highest then, so I choose 1.
@Jake: Its magical, end of question.
@Rswizz: I hate the auto tune and lack of thought that goes into pop music. So I would have to say I dislike most of it.
@Awarrior: 1. I don't love any other games really. I like TitanFall, but I sadly don't own it. 2. I don't think it does, its not exactly official.
@Dark: Already answered it, its s Soy Vanilla with Chocolate Syrup.
@Justin: Appeal at support@avicus.net
@Howsie: I see that trick question. None because they all are dumb.
@Luca: Tigers (I was born in the year of the tiger), Ternio, Dogs.
@Cedar: We recently went through all ban appeals. Its possible for him to be appealed, but I can't guarantee anything.
